articles.title: Altruist Rebrands: Platform Growth Accelerates
articles.summary: Altruist rebranded its platform with a new visual identity, updated messaging, and enhanced user experience. This rebrand aimed to modernize the brand, clarify the value proposition, and expand market reach. The rebrand strategy lead to the platform's rapid growth, user-centric approach, and strong value proposition.

articles.title: Flood Watch in effect until 10 p.m. as rain continues across the Hill Country
articles.summary: KENS 5 launched the KENS 5 app, enabling users to stream KENS 5 content on their phones.

articles.title: 39 early Prime Day deals you need to shop this weekend
articles.author: Sarah Vazquez
articles.summary: Amazon is offering early Prime Day deals, including a discount on the De'Longhi La Specialista Arte Evo Espresso Machine, now priced at $480, and the Samsonite Omni 2 Hardside Expandable Spinner, available for $105. These deals represent the lowest prices seen for these products, available before the main Prime Day event.

articles.title: 28 Things Small Enough To Fit In Your Purse That You'll Definitely Want To Have On Hand This Summer
articles.author: Chelsea Stuart
articles.summary: Revlon has introduced an oil-absorbing volcanic face roller. Cocokind launched Mymatcha All-Over Moisture Stick containing coconut oil, sunflower oil, and vitamin E. Additionally, I Dew Care has introduced a benzene-free "Tap Secret" mattifying powder shampoo.

articles.title: Generative Search Visibility Gives Businesses an Edge in AI Search
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: Frank Masotti has launched Generative Search Visibility (GSV), a new done-for-you system. This system is designed to help companies appear in AI search results by providing Generative Search Visibility Deliverables.

articles.title: Generative Search Visibility Gives Businesses an Edge in AI Search
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: Frank Masotti has launched Generative Search Visibility (GSV), a service to enhance business visibility in AI search results. GSV offers a suite of digital assets, including a custom-built website and branded social media accounts, to improve a company's presence in AI Overviews and AI responses. The assets can be transferred to the client if they discontinue the service.

articles.title: Affordable Old Navy Finds: 27 Cute Styles Under $100
articles.author: Ellie Jane Rudy
articles.summary: A collection of new clothing items are available. They range from casual wear like jersey pajama jumpsuits and oversize T-shirts to more dressy items like maxi dresses and blazers, all catering to comfort and style. Many items are offered in inclusive sizes and a variety of colors, suitable for different occasions and preferences.

articles.title: Samsung Will Soon Discover If â€˜Ultra' Meets Expectations
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Samsung is planning to launch new foldable phones, including an Ultra-branded Fold with a slimmer design to compete with Honor and Oppo, the Z Flip 7 with a larger display, and a cheaper FE variant. The company is also rumored to be working on new innovations like an extra hinge. These adjustments aim to tackle the high cost and durability issues of foldable phones.

articles.title: 35 Incredibly Effective Products
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: The article features several newly introduced or updated cleaning and cosmetic products such as a tightening cream infused with caffeine, coconut oil, and guarana extract to firm and smooth the skin, and a WD-40 pen for precise application of the lubricant. Additionally, it highlights products that improve household function, including foaming garbage disposal cleaners and a Bissell Little Green machine for upholstery and carpet cleaning.

articles.title: This Hidden Windows Feature Makes Installing Software a Breeze
articles.author: Tashreef Shareef
articles.summary: Microsoft introduced WinGet, a command-line tool built into Windows 10 and 11, for installing and managing applications directly from official sources.  Winstall, a third-party website, helps users create custom WinGet scripts for batch installations of applications like Chrome, Discord, and Steam, streamlining the setup process on new PCs.

articles.title: Tone, the Personal Care Brand Founded by Six Twitch Streamers, Is Entering Target
articles.author: Noor Lobad
articles.summary: AMP launched Tone, a unisex personal care brand, which debuted with body lotions, deodorants, and lip balms. Tone is expanding into retail with Target, adding body wash and body mist (Cologne) to its assortment. The brand plans fragrance-forward innovations in the next 12-18 months.

articles.title: 37 Products With Results That'll Make You Say 'No Way'
articles.author: Curtis Teegardin
articles.summary: L'OrÃ©al Paris introduced a BB Cream as a more affordable alternative to Dr Jart+ Cicapair Color Correcting Cream, designed to neutralize redness. Essence launched the Lash Princess mascara for lengthening and volumizing lashes and E.l.f Lash Xtndr Tubing Mascara. OGX released the Argan Oil of Morocco Curl-Defining Cream for frizz control.

articles.title: Best early Prime Day 2025 deals on Ninja: Shop air fryers, blenders, and more
articles.author: Samantha Mangino
articles.summary: Early deals on Ninja products are available leading up to Prime Day. These deals feature Ninja's popular kitchen appliances.

articles.title: Summer Problem-Solvers: 47 Products You Need Now
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: Shark introduced the FlexBreeze Pro Mist Fan, designed for both indoor and outdoor use with a 70 ft. reach and quiet operation, which can also be used as a table fan. Also, Veer launched the Cruiser City wagon designed to make summer outings easier with room for necessities and stroller-like maneuverability. Olay released the Super Serum Body Wash to provide 24-hour hydration and treat dehydrated skin.

articles.title: GoHighLevel Bootcamp Launches with 30-Day Free Trial Access for New Users
articles.summary: GoHighLevel launched the new HighLevel Bootcamp, a live and interactive educational experience for entrepreneurs using the HighLevel platform. New users get a complimentary 30-day trial and exclusive bonuses. The bootcamp offers step-by-step guidance and support for launching businesses on HighLevel.

articles.title: Early Prime Day Deal: Dyson V8 Cordless Vacuum Just $300
articles.author: Matt Jancer
articles.summary: The Dyson V8 vacuum cleaner is on sale for $300 for Prime members, reduced from $470. It's an entry-level stick vacuum that includes attachments for cleaning floors, baseboards, and ceiling cobwebs and can be converted to a handheld vacuum.

articles.title: Parents go wild over â€˜brilliant' 15p hack that removes grim stains from your whites â€“ it's a must for school uniforms
articles.author: Kate Kulniece
articles.summary: Jemma Craig recommends Stain Remover Soap for cleaning white socks, highlighting its natural ingredients and cost-effectiveness. Customers praise its stain-removing capabilities. The Stain Remover Soap is available for purchase online in two and three-pack options. The article also suggests Napisan as an alternative product for stain removal.

articles.title: The Best Amazon Prime Day 2025 Deals, Approved By Our Editors
articles.author: Jordan Thomas
articles.summary: Amazon Prime Day 2025 features discounts on products from companies like Yeti, Dyson, Samsung, and Instant Pot. Specific deals include a Dyson stick vacuum, Anker Soundcore speakers, Oral-B toothbrushes, and Yeti coolers, among many other discounted products and devices. These deals are available to Amazon Prime members.

articles.title: 5 shower accessories you never knew you needed on sale for Prime day
articles.author: USA TODAY
articles.summary: Amazon is offering deals on various shower accessories during Prime Day 2025, which runs from July 8-11. Highlighted products include the Lamicall Waterproof Shower Phone Holder, INSMY C12 IPX7 Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker, and POBAMLE Shampoo and Conditioner Wall-Mounted Dispenser. These items are available at discounted prices for Amazon Prime members.

articles.title: â€˜Our relationship with phones has grown unhealthy': Nothing's AI chief explains how the Nothing Phone 3 will â€˜help you be more human'
articles.author: Axel Metz
articles.summary: Nothing is launching its new flagship phone, the Nothing Phone 3, which features a Glyph Matrix display, Essential Search, and Essential Space features. The Phone 3 will be available for pre-order from Nothing and globally on July 15, with a price tag of $799 / Â£799 / AU$1,509.

articles.title: 36 Useful 'Most Wished For' Amazon Products
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Amazon showcases products in its "Most Wished For" section, highlighting items like the Owala Freesip water bottle with a built-in straw and push-button lid, the Ninja Creami for making desserts, and the Bissell Little Green machine for stain removal. There is also an ultra-quiet Levoit humidifier designed with a top-fill tank for seamless refills. Additionally, Tushbaby is promoting a hip carrier designed to reduce back strain while carrying a kid around.

articles.title: All the Middle of Lidl offers on shelves this weekend including Ninja airfryer dupe and Karcher pressure washer
articles.author: Assistant Consumer Editor
articles.summary: Lidl is launching a range of new products in its stores, including a Karcher pressure washer priced at Â£89.99, an air fryer with grill and smoker for Â£99.99, and a folding gazebo available for Â£69.99 for Lidl Plus members. Additionally, they are introducing a Grillmeister pizza oven for Â£29.99, a mosaic garden table for Â£19.99, a black LED solar lantern for Â£7.99, and beige jute placemats for Â£3.49.

articles.title: All the Middle of Lidl offers on shelves this weekend including Ninja airfryer dupe and Karcher pressure washer
articles.author: Lana Clements
articles.summary: Lidl is introducing new products in its stores, including a Karcher pressure washer for Â£89.99, an air fryer with grill and smoker for Â£99.99, a folding gazebo for Â£69.99, a Grillmeister pizza oven for Â£29.99, a mosaic garden table for Â£19.99, a black LED solar lantern for Â£7.99 and Beige Jute Placemats for Â£3.49. These items are intended to help shoppers upgrade their outdoor spaces.

articles.title: 29 Things I Found On TikTok That Are Actually Really Cool
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: Olay has launched the Super Serum Body Wash, which is a body wash version of their effective facial Super Serum and is packed with niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides. Anua has introduced the heartleaf pore-clearing cleansing oil, a viral product that dissolves makeup and removes excess sebum.

articles.title: OnePlus Nord CE5 Launch in India on July 8, Battery Details Revealed; Check Expected Price, Specifications and Features
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching new smartphones, the OnePlus Nord CE 5 and OnePlus Nord 5, on July 8, 2025, along with OnePlus Buds 4. The OnePlus Nord CE 5 is expected to feature a MediaTek Dimensity processor, dual camera setup, and a 7,100mAh battery with 80W fast charging, with a starting price of around INR 24,999. Samsung is also expected to unveil the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 on July 9, 2025.

articles.title: 41 Things For Embarrassing Problems
articles.author: Negesti Kaudo
articles.summary: The article introduces a range of new consumer products, including a sweat-activated dry shampoo for post-workout refreshment, a piercing bump solution for keloids and scars, and a crack weeder tool for gardening. Other highlighted products include a Levoit air purifier for removing allergens, Revlon's oil-absorbing volcanic face roller for oily skin, and a Gold Bond neck and chest firming cream, all offering innovative solutions for everyday needs.

articles.title: The latest Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Z Flip 7 leaks may have revealed battery and durability info â€“ as well as on-sale dates
articles.author: David Nield
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to unveil the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7 on July 9. Preorders are expected to begin on the same day, with shipping and in-store availability slated for July 25. These new foldables may feature IP48 rating for dust and water resistance.

articles.title: Tecno Pova 7 Unboxing: Thin, Powerful, 7000mAh
articles.summary: Tecno has launched the Pova 7 series, introducing the Pova 7 and Pova 7 Pro smartphones designed for budget-conscious consumers. These models boast large batteries, capable camera systems, and smooth performance. The Tecno Pova 7 is expected to have a 7000mAh battery, fast charging, and a versatile camera system, targeting gamers, power users, and budget-conscious consumers.

articles.title: Express Clean Laundry finds success with LG commercial washers
articles.author: Back End News
articles.summary: Express Clean Laundry utilizes LG Commercial Washers and Dryers in their 22 laundry lounges across the Philippines. These LG machines, known for their high-capacity, durability, and energy efficiency, enable Express Clean to efficiently handle customer demand and maintain smooth operations. LG Philippines also partners with Express Clean to demonstrate the strength of LG's Commercial Laundry System.

articles.title: Ai+ Pulse, Ai+ Nova 5G Launch in India on July 8, Will Likely Run on NxtQuantum OS; Check Expected Price, Specifications and Features
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Ai+ is launching two new smartphones, the Ai+ Pulse and Ai+ Nova 5G, in India on July 8, 2025. The Ai+ Nova 5G will feature a dual rear camera with a 50MP primary lens, while the Pulse Ai+ will also have a 50MP primary rear camera. Both models will run on NxtQuantum OS and be available on Flipkart, with prices potentially starting from INR 5,000.

articles.title: 41 Best Cult-Fave Products On Amazon's Hidden List
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Amazon features TikTok-viral products, including the newly available Eos Cashmere Body Oil. L'Oreal Paris introduces Infallible 3-Second Setting Spray Mist as a long-lasting makeup solution. Garnier Fructis launches Sleek & Shine Anti-Frizz Serum to manage frizz in warmer temperatures.

articles.title: Reliable SEO Services In Abbottabad
articles.summary: DID Brains Digital Marketing Agency offers SEO services to businesses in Abbottabad, Pakistan. Their services include deep keyword research, on-page SEO execution, and white-hat link building. The agency provides transparent reporting and support, with affordable packages tailored to local businesses.

articles.title: Olay's â€˜anti-wrinkle' cream that's â€˜better than high end brands' has 63% off
articles.author: Grace Salmon
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a 63% discount on Olay's Regenerist Whip Moisturiser as part of an early Prime Day deal. The moisturiser, originally priced at Â£38 and now available for Â£14, features Niacinamide and anti-ageing peptides, promising to reduce fine lines and wrinkles while providing SPF 30 protection.

articles.title: 41 Super Affordable Products To Upgrade Your Routine
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: The article highlights several new product introductions. Catrice launched "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener now in four shades. Essence introduced a cruelty-free lengthening mascara priced under $5, receiving positive reviews, also Anua released pore-clearing cleansing oil, specifically designed to help regulate sebum production and break down blackheads.

articles.title: OnePlus Buds 4 To Launch In India On July 8: Key Features Revealed
articles.author: News18
articles.summary: OnePlus will launch OnePlus Buds 4, its newest TWS earphones, on July 8. The new earphones have advanced features for an enhanced audio experience.

articles.title: This beloved pair of sneakers gets a bolder, louder makeover
articles.author: John Legaspi
articles.summary: Secret Fresh and World Balance are launching a new colorway of their 'Penetrator' sneakers, called the Penetrator MSE exclusive colorway. These limited-edition sneakers feature bright pink laces, a mix of blue, orange, and yellow accents, and the iconic I-sperm logo. The sneakers will be unveiled at The Manila Sneaker Expo on July 6, 2025, and will retail at P2,999.

articles.title: OnePlus Pad 3 review: A sneak peek at the launching-soon premium Android tablet
articles.author: Sahil Bhalla
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching the Pad 3, a premium Android tablet featuring a 13.2-inch display, Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, and 12,140 mAh battery, with prices starting at USD 699.99. A new keyboard case and Folio Case are also available as accessories. The Pad 3 aims to compete with the iPad Pro and Galaxy Tab S10 series.

articles.title: New Look sale sees 'pretty, figure-skimming' dress reduced by 40%
articles.author: Kelly Ashmore
articles.summary: New Look has reduced the price of its Blue Satin Floral Print Mini Dress by 40%, bringing it down to Â£16.79. The short-sleeved dress, available in sizes six to 22, features a floral print, elasticated back waist, and a cut-out back. The retailer suggests styling it with boot heels and a denim jacket.

articles.title: Niu Technologies Provides Second Quarter 2025 Sales Volume Update  Jul. 5, 2025 04:05
articles.summary: NIU Technologies launched a comprehensive portfolio of electric motorcycles, including off-road models, in international markets. This product introduction is supported by an expanded distribution network to strengthen the company's global market position.  In China, NIU focused on key product line development, enhancing existing models through continuous upgrades.

articles.title: Bridging the Online Branding Gap: Why 2026 presents an opportunity for brands
articles.author: Pierre Dandjinou
articles.summary: ICANN is preparing for the next round of the New Generic Top-Level Domains (gTLD) Program in April 2026, allowing businesses to apply for and operate new gTLDs. These gTLDs can enhance brand recognition, build stronger customer connections, and offer better control over online presence. ICANN is committed to raising awareness and providing resources to help organizations understand the program and application process.

articles.title: Xpeng launches G7 at less than $A41,700, obtains 10,000 orders in just 9 minutes
articles.author: Riz Akhtar
articles.summary: Xpeng launched the new G7 SUV, receiving over 10,000 pre-orders within an hour and 10,000 firm orders in just 9 minutes after unveiling its price. The G7, an 'AI smart family SUV,' features a rear-mounted single motor, LFP battery packs, and a 15.6-inch screen, with deliveries expected to begin soon.

articles.title: GCash VP and Head of New Businesses Winsley Bangit encourages â€˜customer-first' mindset at product summit
articles.author: Inquirer.Net Brandroom
articles.summary: GCash VP Winsley Bangit discussed the company's evolution from a payments solution to an inclusive digital finance platform. GCash focuses on intentional innovation, designing products based on real user problems and building ecosystems that benefit everyone. The company identifies opportunities to enhance features, enable users, and empower merchants, resulting in its expansion into a comprehensive ecosystem.

articles.title: One thing Amazon Prime Day shoppers must do to get the best deals
articles.author: Phoebe Barton Lifestyle
articles.summary: Amazon is launching Prime Day sales event on July 8th, offering exclusive discounts to Prime members. Featured products include the Shark fan (discounted), the Samsung tablet, and the Tefal air fryer (44% off). Amazon's AI shopping assistant, Rufus, is available to help members find deals and product information.

articles.title: 41 Game-Changing Products You Never Knew Existed
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: The Pink Stuff introduced the "Sqeezy" sponge set, which includes a miracle cleaning paste and a sponge. Bella introduced the Ceramic Fold-n-Store Dual Griddle, enabling users to whip up pancakes even in small kitchens. E.l.f. launched Holy Hydration! Thirst Burst Drops, a new skincare serum.

articles.title: This Post Is A Treasure Trove Of Gems From Amazon
articles.author: Curtis Teegardin
articles.summary: Laneige introduced Neo Blurring Powder, which is designed to blur pores, absorb oil, and provide a matte finish. Maybelline launched a volumizing brow mousse for natural-looking, full brows. The LoudCup is a 20-ounce tumbler with a built-in stadium horn.

articles.title: Nutribullet's McLaren F1 blender on sale ahead of British GP
articles.author: Phoebe Barton
articles.summary: Nutribullet and McLaren have launched the NutriBullet x McLaren F1 Team 900 Series blender, which boasts increased power and enhanced extraction capabilities compared to previous models. The blender includes multiple lids and cups, and is designed for ease of use and cleaning.

articles.title: MADMIA and Peppa Pig Introduces New Sock for Kids and Adults
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: MADMIA launched a new playful sock design. This design is a collaboration with a beloved children's brand.

articles.author: Jaspreet Bindra
articles.summary: Claude has launched a new AI-powered Artifacts feature that allows users to create adaptive tools with embedded AI intelligence. This feature enables analysis of user input and personalized recommendations and can be used to create sophisticated analysis tools, such as an AI-powered feature impact predictor for product managers.

articles.title: Next's 'comfortable' Â£28 dress makes shoppers 'instantly feel dressed up'
articles.author: Leonie Benhamouche
articles.summary: Next offers the Puff Sleeve Off Shoulder Midi Dress (Â£28-Â£42) and Forever Comfort Double Strap Footbed Sandals (Â£29). New Look retails the Striped Woven Puff Sleeve Milkmaid Midi Dress for Â£35.99. The Nova Midi Dress from Nobody's Child is available for Â£72.25-Â£130.

articles.title: The First New Zelda Game on Switch 2 Needs to Get One Thing Right That ...
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: The Legend of Zelda launched on the Nintendo Switch 2 platform. At launch, there were noteworthy releases in The Legend of Zelda franchise.

articles.title: Making the decision on new fishing technology
articles.author: Jack Wollitz
articles.summary: FC Marine installed the Eagle Eye 9 sonar device on a Bass Cat boat. The Eagle Eye 9 features GPS, forward-facing livescope, and downscan with CHIRP. Initial experiences with the Eagle Eye 9 indicate it is a helpful tool for identifying fish and improving the fishing experience.

articles.title: Int'l luxury brands ride "debut economy" wave to tap Chinese market
articles.author: Xinhua
articles.summary: International luxury brands have launched new products in Shanghai, embracing China's "debut economy." These brands also opened new stores and hosted exclusive events.

articles.title: UAE's Amazon Bazaar Brings Budget Shopping to Mobile Shoppers
articles.author: The Arabian Post
articles.summary: Amazon has launched a new mobile-only shopping section called Bazaar within its Amazon.ae app in the UAE. This platform offers value-focused products across fashion, home, and lifestyle categories. The launch is initially in beta for select users.

articles.title: Someone's getting fired. How is this Microsoft Office and Windows 11 Pro deal only $45?
articles.author: Popular Science
articles.summary: Deal Days offers Microsoft software worth $418.99 for $45. This promotion provides a significant discount to readers.
